p: Bars showing the percentage of patients whoâ€™s serum uric acid concentration was decreased after treatment. Bars in this figure showing that in 50.9% of study population in the test group individual treated with urinile whereas 67.85% of the allopurinol treated patients have uric acid concentration <8 mg/dl. Uric acid concentration of all study subjects were >8 mg/dl before giving any type of treatment. So urinile and allopurinol treatment lowers the uric acid concentration in gouty arthritis patients.
